Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.socket.server.game

Record Class ServerGameSender

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.socket.server.game.ServerGameSender
Record Components:
out - the output stream
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerPlayerConnector, ServerTableConnector
public record ServerGameSender(@NotNull PrintWriter out) extends Record implements ServerPlayerConnector, ServerTableConnector
The class that sends the game messages to the clients. It implements the ServerPlayerConnector and ServerTableConnector interfaces
